Very well, awesome emulator, it emulates Wii and Gamecube games very well and the resolution is beautiful, it supports up to 5K even though I just prefer to use 720p, you also get to choose a wide-range of controllers from Nintendo Gamecube controller to an emulated controller meaning you can use keyboard and mouse to play Nintendo Gamecube and Nintendo Wii Games, also works with Riiconnect24 (news and forecast channel) and works with wiimmfi patched games meaning you can play online with Wii emulation and you can also use cheats! great for PCs and Laptops, may not work well with low-end PCs but stable and its Dolphin 5.0 whats a more better option!

Great if you want to use the Mii Channel, or any other Wii game. It slows down on a few games, but otherwise it's a great emulator. You can even upscale games to play them in HD!
Works well on debian, as the distro supplied version is rather outdated.

It doesn't seem to have SDL API support with the current 5.0.19870-4.fc39 version, it is quite outdated. Because of this, controllers like the PS4 controller or Gullikit KinKong 2 Pro can't be used for Wii games that require motion, this means most of them.

That aside, works well.
Dolphin is excellent

As Dolphin almost never has numbered "stable" releases (the last one was released over five years ago!), most distros' repositories have quite outdated versions of Dolphin.

In contrast, this unofficial Flatpak version of Dolphin matches the latest Beta release. Everything works as you'd expect; the maintainers of this Flatpak recently fixed a long-standing bug, allowing real Wiimotes to be used.

The emulator itself is one of the most feature-packed & mature emulators I've ever used. Dolphin isn't just the best Gamecube/Wii emulator, it's one of the best emulators period.
summary: The best way to use Dolphin on Linux

El emulador es casi perfecto, tiene todas las opciones para configurar los controles y la interfaz es idéntica a Dolphin de la versión de Windows. Incluso pude importar los perfiles de la configuración de los controles y haciendo algunas correcciones en la configuración funciona perfecto.

Sin embargo, tengo dos inconvenientes que no tenía con la versión de Windows, 1. Puedo conectar el Wiimote al computador pero Dolphin no lo reconoce y 2. Cuando conecto el mando de Xbox 360 funciona pero no es posible activar la opción para que el mando vibre.
summary: No puedo conectar un Wiimote a Dolphin

je ne peux dire que tu bien de cet émulateur qui m'a fais vivre tellement de bons moments en revivant les meilleurs jeux de mon enfance

zelda twilight princess - mario galaxie 1 et 2 - mario bros - zelda wind waker
-
tout les jeu marche même avec mon ordinateur qui n'est vrément pas puissant.

J'aime beaucoup Dolphin, je l'utilise sur tout les appareils possible et imaginable. Le logiciel est simple, facile à comprendre, et surtout, n'a aucunes limites !
Bien évidemment, il faut respecter la loi pour obtenir des jeux mais il y a largement de quoi faire !
